content: {"name": "City Harvest Mobile Market - St. Mary's", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Parking lot adjacent to 595 Trinity Avenue", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cityharvest.org/programs/mobile-markets/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "595 Trinity Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10455", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.815128, "longitude": -73.909729}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 412-0600", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will reschedule in case of holiday closures"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Eligible if you are a  resident of St. Mary\u2019s Park, E.R.
